data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Gwangju.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gwangju, South Korea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Gwangju.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 240,708 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Gwangju.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kyrgyz people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kyrgyz people know you.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Gwangju with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Gwangju, South Korea today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gwangju, South Korea has a population of 1,471,300.

We estimate Gwangju has 240,708 people who might know Jesus, 202,176 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,028,417 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 240,708 believers in Gwangju to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Gwangju
location.people_groups_list: Vietnamese, Burmese, Deaf, Malay, Chinese, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vietnamese (151,000), Burmese (23,000), Deaf (103,000), Malay (9,600), Chinese, general (1,039,000)
